listings.description: Eco-friendly 3-bedroom home with solar panels, open-concept kitchen, hardwood floors, and abundant natural light. Spacious living room opens to a fenced backyard ideal for gardening.
listings.neighborhood_description: Green Oaks is an environmentally conscious community with community gardens, organic markets, bike paths, and easy access to public transit.

listings.description: Contemporary coastal home featuring a chef's kitchen with quartz counters, primary suite with balcony, and a two-car garage. Energy-efficient HVAC and double-pane windows.
listings.neighborhood_description: Harbor View overlooks the marina with seafood restaurants, waterfront parks, and weekend markets. Quick access to ferries and express buses.

listings.description: Charming two-story with updated kitchen, cozy fireplace, and a sunny breakfast nook. Backyard includes a small patio and raised garden beds.
listings.neighborhood_description: Tree-lined streets, neighborhood playgrounds, and highly rated public schools. Convenient shopping plaza and family-run cafes nearby.

listings.description: Bright, open-plan home with vaulted ceilings, a large island kitchen, and a flexible office/guest room. Attached two-car garage and recent roof upgrade.
listings.neighborhood_description: Quiet residential enclave with parks, community pool, and easy highway access. Weekend farmers market and several top-rated schools.

listings.description: Single-level ranch with renovated bathrooms, energy-efficient appliances, and a spacious living room. French doors open to a private, landscaped yard.
listings.neighborhood_description: Walkable streets with local grocers, coffee shops, and bike-friendly roads. Frequent bus service connects to downtown.

listings.description: Modern condo with floor-to-ceiling windows, stainless appliances, and in-unit laundry. Secure building with gym and dedicated bike storage.
listings.neighborhood_description: Urban neighborhood along the river with arts venues, theaters, and a growing restaurant scene. Excellent transit connections.

listings.description: Well-maintained home featuring a spacious kitchen, energy-saving insulation, and a two-car garage. Backyard deck ideal for outdoor dining.
listings.neighborhood_description: Family-friendly area with bike lanes, dog parks, and quick bus routes. Close to shopping centers and a popular community garden.

listings.description: Expansive home with lake views, gourmet kitchen, and a great room perfect for entertaining. Primary suite with spa bath; three-car garage.
listings.neighborhood_description: Upscale community with waterfront trails, kayak launches, and fine dining. Quick highway access for regional commuting.

listings.description: Industrial-chic loft with exposed brick, high ceilings, and a modern kitchen. Elevator building, rooftop deck, and dedicated parking.
listings.neighborhood_description: Vibrant urban scene with theaters, galleries, coffee houses, and late-night eateries. Excellent bike share and subway lines.

listings.description: Move-in ready home with a sunny living room, updated HVAC, and a fenced backyard perfect for pets or gardening. Attached garage with storage.
listings.neighborhood_description: Suburban tranquility near greenbelts and walking paths. Strong school district and convenient big-box and local shopping.
